sampleDescriptions: The specific work for this project is on behalf of Walk Free, one of the Minderoo Foundation's initiatives. Walk Free seeks to end modern slavery within a generation. Areas of focus will be on issues

Legislative changes related to ending modern slavery, including SB 4213 (Fashioning Accountability and Building Real Institutional Change Act) and SB 3578 (Slave-Free Business Certification Act of 202
